name: LIKE A HAT IN THE WIND
name_original: LIKE A HAT IN THE WIND
description:
Take care of the hat!
In this side-scroller, you control the wind, trying to keep the hat up in the air and away from all kinds of dangers at a funfair.

Controls
Touch and hold the screen to blow the hat upwards

Programming & Graphics & Sound:
- Deniz Akyildiz
- Nico Beerepoot
